author: ap news
title: Celebrity 'spy' whale spotted with harness found dead in Norwegian waters...
content: A white beluga whale named “Hvaldimir” that was first spotted in Norway not far from Russian waters with a harness that ignited rumors he may be a Moscow spy has been found dead.

author: JOSEF FEDERMAN Associated Press
title: Family confirms death of hostage, former Richmond resident Hersh Goldberg-Polin
description: The family of Israeli-American hostage Hersh Goldberg-Polin says he has been killed in the Gaza Strip. The family issued a statement early Sunday, hours after the Israeli army said it had located bodies in Gaza.
content:
JERUSALEM The family of Israeli-American hostage Hersh Goldberg-Polin says he has been killed in the Gaza Strip.
